meRepresenta.title: #MeRepresenta
meRepresenta.description: This platform operates as a digital space where candidates and voters that have the same priorities can meet.

hackingVigilance.title: Hacking Vigilance
hackingVigilance.description: Hacking Vigilance is an informative platform about digital security best practices, where we suggest tools and spread knowldge that could help increase your digital security online.
